fullText: Rob McClure gives a knockout performance as the Little Tramp in this earnest but overstuffed biomusical that tries to cram too much of Charlie Chaplin's life into one evening.
dtliExcerpt: Rob McClure gives a knockout performance as the Little Tramp in this earnest but overstuffed biomusical that tries to cram too much of Charlie Chaplin's life into one evening.
